--- !bad_no_statement.sql
GRAPH MyGraph

--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/gql/!bad_no_statement.sql:2:1: expect one or more GQL statements, but: <eof>
  2|  
   |  ^


--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 13,
          Name:    "MyGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.BadGQLLinearQueryStatement{
        BadNode: &ast.BadNode{
          NodePos: 14,
          NodeEnd: 14,
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH MyGraph
